title: The Golden Forest - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Mature   Romance
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Beautiful Female Lead   Female Protagonist   Gods   Love Triangles   Magic   Prophecies
author: Yoon SoRi   윤소리
description:
Renier of Elde Isle, thou who art loved by Inanna.

Thy possess a fragrance that will allure many men.

I see two men who shalt love thee.

“Never forget. You offered your life to me, and you vowed to be mine. You may not dispose of your life without my permission because it belongs to me.”

And I see two men whom thou shalt love.

“There’s something I want to tell you no matter what once I’ve done everything I have to do. I’ll protect you. From everyone who ever tries to hurt you……. And from every god who ever tries to hurt you too.”

But the blessing became a curse, and the choice became as chains.

Renier decided that she would no longer allow it to hold sway over her.

And above all else,

She resolved herself to never love another and thereby transfer her curse onto them.>
